articles.author: FourFourTwo
articles.title: Casillas: I wish my Madrid farewell compared to Iniesta, Torres
articles.description: Iker Casillas would have liked a Real Madrid farewell similar to the ones received by Andres Iniesta and Fernando Torres earlier this month.

articles.author: FourFourTwo
articles.title: World's best Neuer incredible on return – Sule
articles.description: Germany defender Niklas Sule lauded Manuel Neuer as the goalkeeper continues his return.

articles.author: FourFourTwo
articles.title: Bolt still chasing football dream, training with Stromsgodset
articles.description: Usain Bolt is not ready to give up on professional football just yet, training with Eliteserien side Stromsgodset.

articles.author: FourFourTwo
articles.title: Lukaku at odds with Mourinho over FA Cup final snub
articles.description: Manchester United striker Romelu Lukaku says Jose Mourinho made the final decision over leaving him on the bench for the FA Cup decider.

articles.author: FourFourTwo
articles.title: It makes sense to him - Danilo defends Man City team-mate Sterling
articles.description: Raheem Sterling's choice of tattoos should be a matter for him and not media "tales" according to Manchester City defender Danilo.

articles.author: FourFourTwo
articles.title: I wouldn't swap Ronaldo for Neymar, says Madrid great Casillas
articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo's future at Real Madrid is once again a source of speculation but Iker Casillas believes Neymar would be a downgrade.

articles.author: FourFourTwo
articles.title: Bates criticised for 'shameful' comments over Chelsea racism claims
articles.description: Ken Bates has suggested racism allegations made against Chelsea when he was chairman are being driven by the "sniff of money".

articles.author: FourFourTwo
articles.title: Lewandowski leaving future to agent
articles.description: Robert Lewandowski will let agent Pini Zahavi handle his future, giving a further indication he could be on his way out of Bayern Munich.

articles.author: FourFourTwo
articles.title: J. League apologises for bogus Torres transfer story
articles.description: Fernando Torres appeared to have signed for Sagan Tosu but the J.League has confirmed the transfer announcement was made in error.

articles.author: FourFourTwo
articles.title: BREAKING NEWS: Terry to leave Aston Villa after play-off disappointment
articles.description: Former Chelsea and England star John Terry is leaving Aston Villa after the club failed to earn promotion to the Premier League.
